channel.title: CVE Feed for stylemix -- eRoom – Zoom Meetings & Webinars
channel.description: The latest CVEs for stylemix -- eRoom – Zoom Meetings & Webinars

item.title: CVE-2024-3275|2024-08-13T13:51:35.454Z -- stylemix -- eroom%20%E2%80%93%20zoom%20meetings%20%26%20webinars
item.description: The eRoom – Zoom Meetings & Webinars plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to Sensitive Information Exposure in all versions up to, and including, 1.4.18 via the search_posts function. This makes it possible for authenticated attackers, with subscriber access and higher, to obtain post excerpts including those of draft and pending posts.
